long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically customise and replace specific words or phrases on web pages with your own alternatives. Perfect for content customisation, language learning, or adding a touch of humour to your browsing experience. Created because I got sick of seeing names like Tonald Dump or Melon Husk on websites, so I made this to give me a break and improve my mental health ðŸ˜ˆ.
